document.full_text: the company that owned the coal mine where 29 miners died in the worst u.s. mining disaster in four decades concluded the explosion was the result of unpreventable natural gas buildup and not coal dust, contradicting the findings of an independent investigation.
document.title: massey contradicts independent mine blast probe
lines_and_colors: the company that owned the coal mine where 29 miners died in the worst u.s. mining disaster in four decades concluded the explosion was the result of unpreventable natural gas buildup and not coal dust, contradicting the findings of an independent investigation.
